snippet: The United States and Europe have a role to play in helping to build an army and a government in Libya.
abstract: Editorial contends kidnapping of Libyan Prime Min Ali Zeidan underscores need for United States and Europe to assist country's fragile transitional government in developing its own security forces and stabilizing the country; warns efforts to bolster Libya's security forces are pointless without replacing the interim government with a more permanent and democratic structure.
lead_paragraph: The United States and Europe have a role to play in helping to build an army and a government in Libya.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
